name: Ida May IPad Carrier in Blue Eyes
description:
This padded Ipad Carrier measures 8.5" x 11", has a thin 44" strap and a fold-over flap with a velcro closure. Two inside pockets complete this beautiful black and white carrier with blue accents.

All Emma Sophia Originals are made with black and white fabric with a choice of accent colors of blue, pink, purple, orange, yellow or green

name: Fiona Lane Snap Purse in Blue Eyes
description:
This is a handy and petite little bag! You can use it as a stand alone on-the-go bag to hold your wallet, lipstick and keys OR you can use use it as an organizer inside one of your other Emma Sophia bags.

 It easily pops open and snaps shut to keep all of your goodies safely inside.

Pictured here in Blue Eyes

The Fiona Lane comes in in Black & White with your choice of accent colors of blue, green, orange, purple, yellow and/or pink. .

name: Bella Grace Sling Bag in Orange Crush
description:
The Bella Grace sling bag is a roomy shoulder bag, with a sturdy strap, handy pockets and magnetic closure. She's got plenty of details and more than enough style to grace any outfit.(Pictured here in Orange Crush).

This purse measures 16"wide x 12" tall with a tie shoulder strap 37" long.


All Emma Sophia Origninals bags come in Black & White with optional accent colors of green, blue, purple, orange, yellow and/or pink.

name: Daisy Anne Clutch in Green Envy
description:
The Daisy Anne is a sweet little clutch! A splash of color against the black & white fabric, and just enough sparkle to add a splash of elegance.

 The black cord strap is removable and the finishing touches are charming. (Pictured here in Green Envy). This clutch measures 5" x 11". 

All Emma Sophia bags come in Black & White with your choice of accent colors of purple, orange, blue, green, yellow and/or pink.

name: Double Delight IPad Carrier
description:
Do you have an IPAD and/or need a generally multi-purpose bag that will hold your valuables securely and make your items readily accessible? This "Double Delight" bag will meet those needs in addition to brightening your day with its colorful and striking appearance and design.

The Double Delight IPAD Carrier is multi colored, measures 9.5" x 13" with a padded 44" strap. The flap closures measures 6.5". You won't be able to resist the black and white, purple, pink, orange, yellow, and blue all mixed in together!

What a striking tote to carry your IPAD and/or other treasures. No more bland, boringly colored carriers and totes allowed!!

name: Dakota Skye Kindle Cover in Green Envy
description:
The Dakota Skye Kindle Cover featured in Green Envy will not only protect your Kindle but also offers a classy custom made cover to enhance your reading pleasures.

This tri-fold cover features a space for the Kindle, measuring 8" high by 6.5", with a 4.5" flap, closed measuring 6.5" x 8". One flap includes one long pocket in addition to divided pockets for credit/debit cards and driver's licence. 

The tablet is held inside securely with elastic bands on all four corners and has a Velcro closure.

name: Amanda "Simple Sensations" Reversible Bag in Green Envy
description:
Amanda is featured in Green Envy, is reversible, washable, goes in the dryer and has a green and black button. 

Just grab this purse, throw it in the bottom of your suitcase and you are all ready to go shopping for all the friends that told you to bring them back a surprise from your vacation!


 All Emma Sophia purses come in black and white with accent colors of blue, purple, pink, green, orange and yellow

name: Polly "Simple Sensations" Purse in Pink Cheeks
description:
Introducing our "Simple Sensations" line with this simple and fun petite Polly purse in Pink Cheeks lined with Purple Plum. 

Simple Sensations has no bells and whistles, no fancy stitching, no quilting or no magnetic snap closure. That enables us to keep the price down for you.

All of our Simple Sensations are still made with high quality fabric, expert workmanship and lots of Love. Just grab it and out the door you go. If it gets dirty, just throw it in the washer and dryer! 


 All Emma Sophia purses come in black and white with accent colors of blue, purple, pink, green, orange and yellow

name: Betty Davis Chevron Purse in Pink Cheeks
description:
Nothing is more classy than our new Chevron design. Great pattern in black with white polka dots with bright pink cheeks will catch everyone's eye. 

Betty started off with 94 3" tiny squares quilted into this beautiful 14" x 9" purse with 2 inside pockets. A magnetic snap closure will keep all your treasures safely inside. 


 All Emma Sophia purses come in black and white with accent colors of blue, purple, pink, green, orange and yellow

name: Jayna Louise Quilted Purse in Purple Plum
description:
Jayna Louis measures 14" at it's widest part, has a scooped neck, a rounded bottom and measures 9" deep.

 A flap with a magnetic snap closure secures your valuables and two inside pockets provide just enough space for keys, cellphone and that hard to find lipstick. 

It has a 42" reinforced strap that will easily sling over your shoulder. Jayna is accented with Purple Plum. 


 All Emma Sophia purses come in black and white with accent colors of blue, purple, pink, green, orange and yellow

name: Yummy Accent Colors
description:
All of our purses, bags and totes are made with Black and White fabric of high quality. We accent these purses with whichever accent color you would prefer. Or you can get crazy with it and add two or three accent colors or go elegant and stick just with the black and white. 

Whichever way you want it, you will get a purse or bag that is made with expert workmanship. We take pride in doing the best job that we know and do not skimp on quality. 

Just look at the beautiful colors that we use. The pattern may change but we try to keep the color true to the pictures.

Accent Colors are:

Pink Cheeks
Purple Plum
Lemon Drop Yellow
Green Envy
Orange Crush
Blue Eyes

options.name: Pink Cheeks, Purple Plum, Blue Eyes, Green Envy, Lemon Drop and Orange Crush

name: Natalie Cell Phone Pouch in Purple Plum
description:
Natalie is an adorable little cell phone pouch that keeps your phone safe and sound as it is padded and has a button closure. 

The back has a zipper pouch big enough to hold your keys, money, and credit cards. 

 All Emma Sophia purses come in black and white with accent colors of blue, purple, pink, green, orange and yellow

name: Abby Hope in Orange Crush
description:
Abby hope is the little bag that does a lot! It is gorgeous and useful, pockets inside and out. Oh, and it is reversible so you get to decide which is the inside and which is the outside.

 You can load this bag up with your current project and take it to the Little League game, to the doctor's office and anywhere you need to go and wait for awhile. 

This bag measures 13" x 13" , is reversible and has a 1.5" x 40" padded strap. 

All Emma Sophia Originals bags come in black and white with accent colors of green, blue, purple, yellow, orange and pink.

name: Fiona Lane Snap Purse in Lemon Drop Yellow
description:
This is an awesome little purse. I don't know what I would do without out it. I keep it in my larger bags to hold all the important stuff that falls to the bottom of the purse like your camera, phone, keys, wallet, lip gloss and makes searching for these things in the bottom of your purse a thing of the past.

It easily pops open and snaps shut to keep all your goodies safely inside. 

The Fiona Lane comes in black and white with accent colors of blue, green, orange, purple, yellow and pink.

name: Brianna Marie In Blue Eyes
description:
Brianna Marie is Black and White with Blue Eyes, Purple Plum and Green Envy accent colors. 

It has two pockets and measures 21" x 15" and has 2 22.2" handles. 

This purse screams "Choose Me" whenever you are headed out the door as it will meet all your needs, no matter where you are going or what you are doing.

All Emma Sophia Originals are made with black and white with your favorite accent colors of purple, green, yellow, orange, blue or pink.

name: Bella Grace Sling Bag in Pink Cheeks
description:
Bella Grace radiates with a sense of class and style. The black and white swirl fabric is enhanced with splashes of pink that pops with richness and beauty.

This bag can go everywhere and you will be sure to get those second-looks by those who will want to know where you bought such a delightful bag. 

The tied shoulder strap make for comfortable carrying and you can't miss the gorgeous flower button. The bag has a magnetic snap closure with two inside pockets. 

All Emma Sophia purses, bags and totes are black and white with accent colors of pink, purple, blue, green, yellow and orange.

options.name: Make sure you let us know what accent color you would like.

name: Lily Rose in Green Envy
description:
Lily Rose is an extra large tote that makes it perfect for a travel bag, diaper bag or shopping tote. It is the ultimate "Day Bag" that will meet all of your needs. It measures 24" wide and 17" tall. The padded shoulder strap measures 41" for easy carrying. The magnetic snap closure keeps all of your treasures inside. This tote has 6 outside pockets and 4 inside pockets. Quilting and button embellishments complete this tote to perfection. 

All Emma Sophia bags, purses and totes are done in black and white with your choice of accent colors of green, orange, yellow, purple, pink and blue.
